phrase.item: Oh dear sisters let's go to Wakhan.
We will walk and [see] the "lola" and "rajhon" flowers.
We will look at the Ishkashim district, we will go with the rubab, remo and Jew's harp.
I went for a journey, traveled Wakhan, to see my dear brother I went full of desire.
He promised that he will come in spring, I went walking to [see] the "lola" and "rajhon" flowers.
Spring came and all flowers bloom, [time] to walk and [see] the flowers.
Wedding and sightseeing started in this country, and Badakhshan province became beautiful.
